name: Lollipop Sweet Heroes Match3
description:
The sweet heroes' adventure! Match candies and activate them to solve puzzles!

Play Lollipop Sweet Heroes Match3 today - the most delectable match-3 game in a candy wonderland!
Join the Marshmallow Heroes - Billy, Willy, and Jackie - on their journey to save Lollipop land!
Each hero has their own special ability which can help you crumble candies and win levels!
Rescue our dessert friends in danger like Cotton Candy Tornado or Ice Cream Flood!

If you have a BIG sweet tooth, you’ve hit the sweet spot with this classic gameplay in a rainbow mania of mixed candy drops, lollipops, and marshmallows! If you’re into casual games, this game is right for you!
Sweeten up the challenge as you crush assorted colorful candies through various quests in beautiful delicious environments, like Lollipop Hill and Caramel Swamp.

Over 500 levels with regular updates in this match 3 game. Enjoy your crunch time and create colorful candy combos and use awesome power-ups, like Sugar bomb and Honey Stick, to help you with stickier levels in this match three game.
One of the best casual games for unlimited fun! Get ready for some crunch time!

HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and match 3 or more candies in this casual game.
• Remove blockers and save the dessert friends in the limited number of moves.
• Collect as many candies as possible by matching to activate Marshmallow Heroes!
• Marshmallows help you with their powerful boosters once they are ready!
• Create amazing combinations like Rocket power-ups and Rainbow candies!
• Clear levels and earn stars to get huge rewards!

FEATURES
• Enjoy exciting challenges in this all-new match 3 puzzle game :
- Cotton Candy Tornado : Rescue the baby marshmallows trapped in Cotton Candy Tornado
- Gingerbread Men : Free Gingerbread Men from the hot oven
- Hide & Seek : Find the hidden marshmallows stuck under the Sugar Glass
- Ice Cream Flood : Save the Lollipop land drowning in Ice Cream Flood
- Pudding Landing : Bring down the Vanilla Pudding to the plate to land perfectly
• No time limit so play at your own pace.
• No wifi required. Enjoy online and offline!
• Crystal crush is here for you! Crumble cookies and start matching!

Match 3 candies and defeat the disasters threatening our Lollipop land in this exciting candy match crystal crush!

• Variety of candies and scrumptious new matching combinations:
- Match 4 candies in a square to get the support of the flying rocket!
- Match 5 candies in an L or T shape to get a Bomb power-up in this candy match!
- Match 5 candies in a line to make a Rainbow candy!

NOTES
• Lollipop Sweet Heroes Match3 contains video ads.
• Lollipop Sweet Heroes Match3 is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like boosters and coins.
• Lollipop Sweet Heroes Match3 can be played on various devices (phones and tablets)
